features: Perfect Hair, Pure Ingredients: For people who care about their hair. And are proud to admit it.

No B.S. (Bad Stuff): Never any sulfates, synthetic fragrances, dimethicone, silicone, parabens, or other garbage that doesn’t have any business in your hair

Pure Love Guarantee: If you don't love it, contact us directly for friendly support or a full refund (no time limit); Plant-derived, hypoallergenic, gluten-free, biodegradable, and proudly Made in America.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Soft hair, clean ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a clean shampoo and conditioner for a long time. I have tried several and I came across Puracy. I used it the first time and I loved it. I had to wash rinse and reapply to get a good lather with the shampoo, but it has a nice soft smells (I am really sensitive to smells) and rinsed out well. The conditioner made my hair soft, I could easily comb through it in the shower and didn't lose a bunch of hair from washing like I usually do. It did have a little bit of an off smell (I was worried from the other reviews I read) in the bottle, but it didn't smell bad when I put it in my hair. My 3 year old told me my hair was "so soft!" As of now I am sold!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good alternative to thriive, shampoo and conditioner
reviews.reviewText: if you have trouble with oily hair or just excessive buildup with regular shampoos, this might be a good option. I like Thriive shampoo and conditioner, although it stinks and is way too expensive for what it is, so I looked for something with comparative ingredients and found Puracy!! my hair maintains volume and curliness with this. On days where I need a little more moisturizer, I will use something like a detangler, it’s a 10 styling product, or other lightweight spray-in products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good products!
reviews.reviewText: I have used the shampoo & conditioner for 6 weeks now, and they gave really helped eliminate itchy scalp issues. Although I recently started using the Puracy body wash in place of the shampoo, and have gotten even better results. My 47 year-old hair is now so soft, light and silky with these products, and my scalp health is improved as well! They are worth a try for high end results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and Fresh
reviews.reviewText: I love how these have cleaner ingredients but still leave my hair feeling fresh and light. The scent is subtle yet refreshing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works beautifully....but also stinks
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE:After going through both the shampoo and conditioner I bought the shampoo refill pouch and have been using it for over a year now, and it’s great! I’ve replaced the conditioner with a different brand - the stink is gone and my hair’s looking a lot bouncier. I wouldn’t recommend the conditioner.Original review:I have fine, slightly dry, wavy, shoulder length hair. This stuff is GREAT for my hair type! I can’t recall the last time my hair looked as shiny and healthy as it has this past week. I’d been considering purchasing this pair for a while but was hesitant since the natural shampoos/conditioners I’ve used previously have been atrocious - either way too stripping and drying or too heavy and oily. However, these products balance my hair nicely. The shampoo lathers up well and the conditioner is exceptionally moisturizing despite being oddly runny and thin. I appreciate having a pump on the bottles, and I like that the plastic’s clear so I can keep track of when I’m running low.Now onto the single downside: the smell. I saw the reviews likening the conditioner to the aroma of “wet dog” and “mildew”, and I thought “pshh those must be exaggerations”, I’m not that picky about haircare scents anyway. Unfortunately they were spot on. The conditioner smells deceivingly fine in the bottle, but something happens when the fragrance is mixed with the humidity of the shower that causes it to exude an incredibly unpleasant scent. I get whiffs as it sits soaking on my hair, and it reeks. Once my hair’s dry the odd stench dissipates and I’m left with fresh smelling hair throughout the day (....or do I simply become acclimated to the odor?) Needless to say, I’d prefer if this came in an “unscented” version since everything else about this product is perfect and I’d rather not walk around wondering whether I stink or not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We've been buying this for years and it leaves my kids Hair so soft, smelling great, and it's all natural. It can be very hard to find a good natural conditioner but this one is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible pumps, decent products
reviews.reviewText: I am so disappointed in these products after being so excited to receive them…. I have a bed and breakfast/yoga space at my house and was thrilled at the idea of being able to have ecologically conscious products that smelled good and could be refilled in our outdoor shower. I will say, both body wash and shampoo smell very good and the conditioner is more effective than most “natural“ conditioners I have tried. And I do like the appearance of the set and the art on the labels. That said, the conditioner does not smell good— it’s not bad exactly but definitely one off— maybe going bad….My biggest issue is that the pumps DO NOT work. As you can see from the picture, the conditioner pump has popped out and the spring is exposed. Most of the time people are dumping it into their hands causing it to be used at a much higher rate. You can still use this one as a pump, but not infrequently the spring falls out rolls off. It is just a matter of time before the spring goes between the cracks in the deck and that pump is totally worthless. Similarly, the shampoo pump doesn’t work and is used as a “dipstick” to get shampoo out. The body wash is the star of the show with both a good smell and functioning pump! As I said, I was really looking forward to being able to use products and refill them to minimize my use of plastic—BUT you can’t refill things if they come in really crappy, non-functional packages in the first place! I do wish this had worked out! Back to the drawing board, I guess….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My skin is extremely sensitive, so a lot of products irritate it, and I went through so many shampoos and conditioners that made my scalp itch before discovering Puracy (I use their body wash/shower gel too, for the same reason). I'd tried some other more natural products, but they left my hair feeling a bit dry. Highly recommend this product and brand, especially for those like me who have sensitive skin!

These products have a gentle scent, not harsh or overpowering. They moisturize without coating, and soften without leaving hair limp. After decades of very dry, straw-like hair, Puracy shampoo and conditioner have given my hair life again.

I've been using Puracy cleaning products for a while and decided to order shampoo and conditioner and cant praise enough about how amazing my hair looks and feels! Before I had to use ton of very expensive products for my hair to look good but now I only use this shampoo and conditioner and with simple blow drying my hair looks and feels amazing. No friz or static, so soft to touch and no dry ends which I always had trouble with and had to use special oil. I'm really impressed with all puracy products!

I bought the shampoo and conditioner because I want to switch to a more natural product. The shampoo felt great and smelled nice but the conditioner... Not so much. My hair felt drier and tangled more easily and the scent, I'm not kidding when I say I gagged ever time I used it. I tossed it after half a bottle because it was so bad. I even took it to work to see if my coworkers felt the same about the smell and 7/8 said it was disgusting. Don't buy this!

reviews.reviewTitle: Leaves no residue on hair or scalp
reviews.reviewText: Leaves hair clean for days. When using other shampoos my hair will get oily next day. I cant say enough good about this product. 5 stars will keep repurchasing.
Citrus and mint is not a nice scent to be mixed, tried this product to switch to a cleaner product but don’t find it works to smooth hair out much.
